bibl.title: A Christian Word-List on a Papyrus of the Bibliothèque Royale at Brussels (Ms. Brux. IV 590).
bibl.note: Two fragments of a papyrus codex, already described by: Martin WITTEK, Les manuscrits grecs de la Bibliothèque Royale Albert Ier: vingt années d'acquisitions (1954-1973), Le Monde grec. Hommages à Claire Préaux (Bruxelles, 1975) pp. 245-253 et pll. I-II. List of trisyllabic words, showing an overwhelming majority of biblical names: writing exercise of a monk? Found in the neighbourhood of Deir-el-Medinet (Luxor), VIth cent. A.D. Transcript and commentary.
